items.sentence: I thought it would be an opportunity for you to improve your French.
My mother asked me not to feed the dog until after we had all eaten.
People have the tendency to speak more loudly when they get excited.
The police believe that Tom may have fallen asleep behind the wheel.
The suspect was taken to the police station for further questioning.
I don\'t think I\'ll have enough time to do everything I want to do.
I don\'t think Tom will be able to do what you\'re asking him to do.
I can\'t believe you\'re eating what the doctor told you not to eat.
The other day you said you lost your umbrella. Did you ever find it?
Tom bought a bottle of vodka and some perfume at the duty-free shop.
